thread.title: Andaz London Liverpool Street Hotel introduces SpacetoStartup
thread.title_full: Andaz London Liverpool Street Hotel introduces SpacetoStartup

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Andaz London Liverpool Street Hotel introduces SpacetoStartup
text:
Andaz London Liverpool Street Hotel introduces SpacetoStartup Andaz London Liverpool Street Hotel introduces SpacetoStartup Details Category: Hotel   16:00 Andaz London Liverpool Street hotel has launched SpacetoStartup, offering their event spaces during the evening to a number of start-up businesses. Like many busy metropolitan cities, London has a shortage of comfortable, affordable and quiet spaces for entrepreneurs and their teams to meet, especially after work lets out. Andaz London Liverpool Street has recognised this issue and formulated a plan to address this demand. This month they’ll be offering their innovative meeting rooms as exclusive and flexible workspaces, which are only available in the evenings after work; giving startup businesses a real chance for growth and success. 
With a membership to SpacetoStartup, teams can use the space to meet, code, brainstorm from 6pm till 10pm on weeknights. Andaz London Liverpool Street is conveniently located just a stone’s throw away from Silicon Roundabout, formally known as Shoreditch area, the vibrant hub for dynamic techies such as Google, Amazon and Facebook. With startup businesses consistently growing and evolving, now is the time to inspire, immerse and ignite creativity in this ever expanding metropolis. To make sure SpacetoStartup is valuable, as well as useful, for members, the Andaz team have worked closely with included.co, the startup that makes 60+ shared spaces worldwide even more valuable and connected every day. As spaces are limited, memberships can be requested via http://www.spacetostartup.com/ on a first-come first-serve basis. Nightly rates at Andaz London Liverpool Street Hotel starting from £180 including VAT per night on Friday and Saturday in an Andaz King room. Room rates include complimentary Wi-Fi, non-alcoholic minibar and local landline phone calls. Related articles
